dmca.title: Infringing reposts of articles
dmca.body:
Apr 04 06 03:49p	p.1
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
(650) 963-3255

April 2, 2006
Dear Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints:
I am contacting you to file a notice of Copyright Infringement.

1.	It has come to my attention that an unauthorized use of my copyrighted article titled All About Glass Dildos" has appeared on a website. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears at 
http://www.allsexquide.com/qlass-dildo.htm

In visiting the following webpage, it is clear that my article was simply copied and pasted into their website, word for word.

2.	Search Query: ann andriani Infringing Web Pages: http://www.scarletqirl.com/article_info.php/cArticlePath/9/articles id/48

Search Query: glass dildos ann andriani
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.scarletqirl.com/article info.php/cArticlePath/9/articles id/48
3.	My contact information is the following: Andrea Ferrier (A.K.A. Ann Andriani) 1529 Yarrow Circle
Bellport, NY 11713
Phone: 631-803-0883
Email: Ann@allsexquide.com

4.	Owners/Administrators of the allegedly infringing webpages:

Vicki Kriner
P.O. Box 55012
Hayward, CA 94545 vickikriner@yahoo.com (510)710-6781

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much for looking into this matter for me. Please feel free to contact me with any questions.
 

Sincerely,
Andrea Ferrier
(AKA Ann Andriani)
ann@allsexguide.com
 
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
(650) 963-3255

April 2, 2006
